page.title: 06Pastimes for girls in Bacup
page.content:
I am a girl. When my friend comes to call we go outside and play tennis. When we are bored we go and get our skates on and ask permission to skate in Broadclough Mill,they usually let us. We pretend that we are on television as famous roller skaters. In summer we go to the park on our bikes. We take 30pence to buy a drink and a packet of crisps.
Girls have various hobbies such as horse riding,running,swimming and other sports. Some like looking after animals,going to the fair,art and collecting things like pop posters, badges and postcards.
Sylvia likes all kinds of art such as origami(the art of paper folding), pencil drawing and painting with water colours and oil paints.
